item.title: Create a Cron Job
item.description: Jobs can be scheduled either using CloudWatch events syntax or cron syntax. To use CloudWatch syntax, call ScheduledJob() on a service builder. To use cron syntax, call the CronJob() method. // Create a job that runs every 15 minutes service.ScheduledJob("scheduled-job-id", "15 minutes", func(ctx context.Context, evt events.CloudWatchEvent) error { // ... }) // Create a job that runs every day a noon UTC service.CronJob("cron-job-id", "0 12 * * ? *", func(ctx context.
